Tool

NameLine Properties
ID2
AuthorO. Conrad (c) 2009

Description

Line properties: length, number of vertices.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Lines Shapes (input)LINES
Output
Lines with Property Attributes (*)Shapes (optional output)OUTPUTIf not set property attributes will be added to the orignal layer.
Options
Number of PartsBooleanBPARTSDefault: 0
Number of VerticesBooleanBPOINTSDefault: 0
LengthBooleanBLENGTHDefault: 1
(*) optional
